__e: What could be worse than torture and murder?
If only I could draw her to the castle, then I'm convinced there would be no more victims.
They were all about torture and death.
How could you sanction the torture of my son?
That's a holy terror of a word.
'Cause when someone does rip our heart out and stomp on it right in front of our eyes, it could be like the worst torture of all.
Yeah, you seem to know a lot about torture.
"Taking pleasure in torture is even worse than murder."
He says a year of torture is enough.
